alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:42PM CDT until July 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hollister, or near Branson, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, Table Rock Lake, Table Rock State Park, Hollister, Forsyth, Table Rock, Kirbyville, Powersite, Protem, Ridgedale, Ozark Beach and Edgewater Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, or Table Rock Lake, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
